local_intent: Translate the grasped cloth edge laterally by 0.1 m along +y while maintaining a stable grasp.
assumptions: Cloth is already grasped from the previous pick step
Y axis corresponds to the lateral folding direction on the tabletop
Small safe in-plane motion does not require re-alignment
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer step in GLOBAL_BT using MoveDelta(y,0.1,800); verifies stability before moving and that the cloth remains held after.
